name: Arena (itch) (kgc00)
description:
Just a top down MoBA style combat game against waves of enemies. 

Use WASD or the arrow keys to move.

Q, E, R, F, Left Mouse Button & Right Mouse Button to use your abilities.

- Fight enemies

- Get resources

- Purchase upgrades

- Fight stronger enemies

Clear all 5 waves to win.

------------------------------

Credits:

- Created by Kirby Cofino

- Free music provided by https://opengameart.org/users/kly

- Free VFX and Models provided by:
